metadata.title: CVE-2023-38427 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.3.8.fs/smb/server/smb2pdu.c in ksmbd has an integer underflow and out-of-boundsread in deassemble_neg_contexts.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
